amendment.description: Amendment reduces the appropriation for administrative expenses of the Export-Import Bank by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 as printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the bill's $47.6 million appropriation for the Ex-Im Bank administrative expenses by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 334 - 77 (Roll no. 210).
